title: What's your best value Snowdown Shop Skin?
body:
**Even though we can't gift each other at these discounted prices it would be cool to see who's lucky/unlucky/jealous/etc.**

My best deal is Sultan Gangplank at 70% off (292rp). I already own 5 GP skins but since it's pretty cool I might pick it up.

{{champion:41}}  

The rest are Pool Party Lulu 30% (945rp), Battle Boss Blitz 30% (945rp), Ghost Bride Morg 40% (585rp), Winter Wonder Ori 40% (585rp) and Order of the Banana Soraka 20% (600rp). None of these are low enough for me to impulse buy at all. Wish the 1350s were more than 30% off since I'd probably buy them.

What did you get?

replies.body: Arcade Riven 60% (540 RP) and Knockout Lee Sin 60% (540 RP) {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}

Highest deals: 70% off Ionian Master Yi and Blood Moon Elise (292)
Best deal: 40% off Pool Party Rek'sai (810)
Other Deals: 40% off Dark Rider Sejuani, 50% off Fedora Tipper Yasuo, 20% off Sinful Succulence Morgana.

This is what my shop had in it.

Ace of Spades Ezreal -30% 525RP
Nottingham Ezreal -50% 260RP
Karate Kennen -50% 260RP
Pool Party Lulu -60% 540RP
Buccaneer Tristana -70% 156RP 
Bioforge Darius -20% 780RP

Already got 2-3 skins each for Ezreal and Tristana.

Might end up buying the Lulu one though, I've got my favourite skin for almost every champ I play but her at the moment.

Redeemed riven 30% (682rp) off getting this i will own all except championship, Noxus anivia 70% (156rp) off this will give me another anivia skin next the team spirit then all anivia skins bought, Jurassic kogmaw 50% (487rp) , Soulstealer vlad 60%(540rp) , veigar greybeard 50% (375rp) , and marquis vlad at 20% (416rp)â€¦  meh ill probs just get the anivia and kog skin
You got way better % off across the board. While I don't see myself getting some of those skins at least they're pretty good deals.
